text: Komsomolsk () is a 1938 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergei Gerasimov.Георгий Жженов: 15 лет, вычеркнутых из жизни It stars Pyotr Aleynikov, Sergei Gerasimov, and Yevgeniya Golynchik. ==Actors== * Pyotr Aleynikov as Pyotr * Sergei Gerasimov * Yevgeniya Golynchik as Cossack Woman * Bari Haydarov as Kilia * Leonid Kmit * Stepan Krylov as Subotin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1938 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Gerasimov
title: Komsomolsk (movie)
